#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <queue>
using namespace std;
void assign(int curr,int a[],int code[],int n,int& num){
	int store = curr;
	a[curr] = num;
	curr = curr-1;
	num--;
	while(curr>=0 && a[curr]==-1){
		a[curr] = num;
		num--;
		curr--;
		}
	curr = store;
	curr++;
	while(curr<=n && code[curr]>=0){
		a[curr] = num;
		num--;
		curr++;
		}
	}
int main(){
	string s;
	cin>>s;
	int n=s.size();
	int code[n+1];
	int a[n+2];
	for(int i=0;i<=n;i++){
		code[i] = 0;
		a[i] = -1;
		}
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		if(s[i]=='C'){
			code[i]--;
			code[i+1]++;
			continue;
			}
		else{
			code[i]++;
			code[i+1]--;
			}
		}
	
	queue<int> pos;
	
	for(int i=0;i<=n;i++){
		if(code[i]>0){
			pos.push(i);
			}
		}
	
	int num = n+1;
	int curr;
	while(!pos.empty()){
		curr = pos.front();
		assign(curr,a,code,n,num);
		curr = pos.front();
		pos.pop();
		}
	
	num++;
	assign(n+1,a,code,n,num);
	
	for(int i=0;i<=n;i++){
		cout<<a[i];
		if(i!=n){
			cout<<" ";
			}
		}
	cout<<endl;
	}
